name: BMO Discount Bond Index ETF
longDescription: The ETF seeks to replicate, to the extent possible, the performance of a discount bond index representing investment grade domestic bond issues denominated in Canadian dollars, net of expenses. Currently, the ETF seeks to replicate the performance of the FTSE Canada Universe Discount Bond Index (the Index). To achieve investment objective the investment strategy of the ETF is to invest in and hold the constituent securities of the Index in the same proportion as they are reflected in the Index. The Manager may also use a sampling methodology in selecting investments for the ETF. As an alternative to or in conjunction with investing in and holding the constituent securities, the ETF may invest in or use certain Other Securities (as defined in the prospectus) to obtain exposure to the performance of the Index.

fullAddress: 43rd Floor, 100 King Street West, Toronto, ON, CA
